attributes.action: Reverse the discriminatory electronics ban on flights from the Middle East
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/additional-airline-security-measures-on-some-routes-travelling-to-the-uk

This issue is due to affect many of the students and business travellers who need access to their work everywhere.
attributes.background:
The Department of Transport introduced discriminatory "security" measures on flight from 6 ME countries: banning in-cabin electronic devices. 
After similar measures by the USA towards Muslim majority countries, it is in conflict with British values of tolerance.
The measure must be reversed.
